data.title: Martin Foster's Profile and Production Credits
data.meta_description: Check out all of Martin Foster's production credits. Staff Me Up is the #1 site for industry networking and up-to-date credit information.
data.text:
Cast three LA season of the UK's hit structured reality show Made In Chelsea, and three new docu-series pilots: (1) Medical (2) Travel (3) Mom-Flipping / Responsible for researching potential talent (cast & hosts) / Outreach / Producing chosen candidates stories, including on camera interviews and casting edits / Pitching candidates to production executives/showrunners

Cast re-enactment medical mystery docu-series. Including highly sensitive outreach to seriously ill, sometimes terminal, patients, while building strong relationships with the countries top hospitals and leading physicians

Wrote field notes, OTF questions, hot sheets & beat sheets / Discussed ideas, character points & story arcs with creative team / Assisted EP in 1st AD-type role / Researched & maintained schedules / Found & scouted locations / Cleared talent & locations / Point person on location / Got appearance, location and material releases signed / Created string outs & made pulls

Devised, researched and developed new docu-series / Cast talent and conducted interviews / Planned overall creative and story arcs, working with Executive Producer, Mark Soldinger and VP of Development, Alice Helliwell Sharpe / Wrote one sheets/pitch package

Achieved lifelong ambition to write a comedic novel, 'Hollywood Househusband' is currently under submission

Wrote comedy pilot ‘Natural Born Worrier’, starring Ashley Jenson (Extras/Ugly Betty), successfully pitched and sold it to NBC Universal / Follow the link to watch the teaser http://clarekilner.com/television

Exec produced various celebrity, lifestyle, & comedy driven radio talk shows / Doubled ratings by creating compelling, interactive stories / Booked celebrity guests, comedians & topical experts / Conducted interviews, both on-air and pre / Hired, trained & managed crew & high profile talent / Covered live red carpet events / Met tight, short and long term, deadlines

Produced/reported on-air music, film, comedy & celebrity news segments / Interviewed some of the biggest names in entertainment, including: Brad Pitt, Samuel L. Jackson, Nicole Kidman and Amy Winehouse.

Produced/reported on-air current affairs segments for nightly news show, syndicated nationally in Australia / Conducted interviews in the field

Produced daily segments from the studio and in the field / Cleared locations / Booked, managed & interviewed cast & guest experts / Directed shoots & supervised editing / Wrote features for Big Brother web site
